subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Forty-one college players will skip their final seasons to enter the N.F.L. draft, the second-fewest underclassmen available for the draft in the last eight years.
snippet: Forty-one college players will skip their final seasons to enter the N.F.L. draft, the second-fewest underclassmen available for the draft in the last eight years.
